alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rockbridge and northwestern Amherst Counties and the City of Buena Vista through 445 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buena Vista, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista... Forks Of Buffalo... Alto... and Oronoco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain at rates of two to four inches per hour will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
